name: Deflect (TheJourneyOfE)
description:
This is a small game I created with very simple graphics and focusing more on the gameplay. Recently, I have noticed that in the Indie market, it seems to a be a lot more efficient to develop replay-able game such as roguelikes or arcade games and thus I have decided to shift my design choices in that direction. Deflect is my first Arcade/Rogue-like-ish game so I was able to learn quite a bit, especially on how to utilize my resources fully such as graphics, music and time. 

Music

Free BGM "Power of Rhythm" 

Composition (Arrangement) Song: FLASH ☆ BEAT

DOVA-SYNDROME Download: https://dova-s.jp/bgm/play13104.html

License : https://dova-s.jp/_contents/license/
